column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Aaron - Thank you for your review. We appreciate the positive rating
column2: and your candid remarks about the other ramen establishments you have tried. Though I must respectfully disagree with your assessment regarding the "vibe" of our establishment. We are a group of 50-60 employees who work hard to create and provide a quality product with excellent service. That is our essential goal. We don't always hit the mark
column3: and we try to learn from our mistakes. But we believe authentic Japanese ramen is for people of all stripes
column4: and having set up shop in Houston nearly five years ago
column5: we have served thousands of guests that would largely defy your description of a "dirty fat boy snack." Again
column6: I say this with respect and admiration since you did not pan us in your review and even stated that you would have given us an additional half-star if given the chance. Thank you again.
